name: Fields of Marrow
description:
The Apprentice Messed Up

The apprentice did a ritual without their mentor's permission. It didn't work...or so they thought. Now the apprentice must fix the problem they started.

Pumpkins Everywhere

The apprentice must traverse through the vast pumpkin patch, evading the newly created Pumpking. All while collecting  items needed to destroy it.

Controls

WASD - movement

Mouse - camera movement

Left + Ctrl - sneak

Left + Shift - sprint

Space - Jump

C - chat

P - menu

F12 - escape / quit

Created by Team Rogue-A for Webster48's Game Jam Prompt - A Strange Exchange
